Special: Defensive, Recharge, Shocking

Note: Loses Shocking Quality while Recharging. Uses Normal Shield Profile while Recharging. Grants +4AP to wielding Arm and Body, Good/Best Craftsmanship have a weapon lock that lets a basic weapon rest on it and fire one-handed without penalty.
